all.description: Gather resources from a resource entity.
Sell an item of inventory to another entity
Sends a message or signal to another entity for coordination.
Allows the entity to recover health or energy over time.
Moves away from a threatening entity to ensure survival.

mercenary.description: Searches the world for enemies to attack.
Disrupts or damages an opposing entity's operations or resources.
Target and attack an opposition static entity structure.

warden.description: Places mechanical traps or automated defenses in the world.
Guards a static entity structure or area against attack.
Guards another dynamic entity while they travel through the world.

thief.description: Attempts to acquire goods from another entity without permission.
Turn invisible and move through an area undetected.
Attack an opposing entity with a chance to steal loot.

beastmaster.description: Attempts to capture and domesticate a wild beast.
Summons a beast entity to the field to attack an opposing entity
Feeds a beast to improve the bond between beastmaster and beast entity

mage.description: Restores health or removes negative effects from another entity.
Casts a protective shield around an ally entity.
Casts a debuff on an opposing entity.

merchant.description: Exchanges items or services with another entity.
Commences journey to another area in the world where trading is more lucrative.
Packages multiple items into a condensed, tradeable unit.

forger.description: Produces equipment or tools using resources.
Improves the quality or capabilities of an existing item, structure, or ability.
Breaks a piece of equipment, tool or consumable back into its base resources.

farmer.description: Harvests advanced crops from an advanced crop entity.
Performs routine upkeep to prevent farm plot entity degradation.
Sews an empty plot with seeds to commence growing crops.

minerjack.description: Mills advanced lumber from an advanced lumber entity
Mines advanced ore from an advanced ore entity.
Clears obstructive static entities to enable entities to pass through.

builder.description: Constructs physical buildings on suitable static entity building plots.
Repairs a damaged ally static entity building.
Upgrades a building to a higher level of functionality.

alchemist.description: Studies a blueprint inventory item to generate new knowledge, recipes, or schematics.
Temporarily turn into a monster to attack opposing entities.

explorer.description: Passively monitors an entity or area for changes.
Logs information about events, enemies, or discoveries.

scholar.description: Studies an inventory item to generate new knowledge, recipes, or schematics.
Provides global intelligence, strategic plans, or prophecy to an entity.
Sell knowledge for upgrades to an entity that can use it

engineer.description: Creates a road, bridge or tunnel on a valid infrastucture plot.
Reapirs a damaged road, bridge or tunnel on a valid infrastucture plot.
Upgrades a road, bridge or tunnel on a valid infrastucture plot for higher functionality.

guildleader.description: Adds an entity to this guildleaders guild.
Removes an entity from this guildleaders guild.
Upgrades guild by studying specific inventory items.
